Class Map<I,O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • quarks.oplet.core.AbstractOplet<I,O>
      • quarks.oplet.core.Pipe<I,O>
        • quarks.oplet.functional.Map<I,O>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - Data container type for input tuples.
    O - Data container type for output tuples.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, Consumer<I>, Oplet<I,O>

    public class Map<I,O>
extends Pipe<I,O>
    Map an input tuple to 0-1 output tuple
